english_translation: Narrated by Ali: When highway robbers cut off the road, display weapons, but do not take money and do not kill a Muslim, then they are captured, they are imprisoned until they die - this is their banishment from the land. If they take money but do not kill, their hands and feet are cut off alternately. If they kill and take money, their hands and feet are cut off alternately and they are crucified until they die. If they repent before being captured, they must pay the money and the legal retaliation is applied to them, but they are not subjected to the prescribed punishment.

english_translation: Narrated by Ali: The son is the nearest of the agnates (asaba), then the son of the son even if he descends. Then the father, then the grandfather even if he ascends. Then the brother from both parents, then the brother from the father. Then the son of the brother from both parents, then the son of the brother from the father. Then the uncle from both parents, then the uncle from the father. Then the son of the uncle from both parents, then the son of the uncle from the father. That is twelve men.

english_translation: Narrated by Ali: One daughter receives one-half, two daughters or more receive two-thirds. Granddaughters (daughters of the son) with one daughter of the deceased receive one-sixth as completion of two-thirds. Granddaughters have nothing with the direct heir daughter except if there is a brother with them who can make them agnates. One sister from both parents receives one-half, two sisters or more receive two-thirds. Sisters from the father along with sisters from both parents are positioned like granddaughters with direct heir daughters.
